title: President, PM grieved over death of ex-Naval chief Admiral Yasturul Haq
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 4 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday expressed their deep grief over the death of former Chief of Naval Staff Admiral Yasturul Haq.
In their separately issued statements, the president and prime minister expressed their condolences over the passing of former Naval chief.
They lauded the late Yasturul Haqâ€™s unforgettable services for the defence and security of the country.
President Zardari and Prime Minister Shehbaz prayed for peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
